verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* fool hath said \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart, There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no God. Corrupt are \w they|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* done abominable iniquity; There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* none \w that|strong="H1732"\w* doeth good.

God looked \w down|strong="H7843"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* heaven \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* children \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*, \w To|strong="H6213"\w* see if there \w were|strong="H3820"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* understand, \w That|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* seek after God.

\w Every|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* gone back; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w become|strong="H7200"\w* filthy; \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* none \w that|strong="H7200"\w* doeth good, \w no|strong="H7200"\w*, \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity \w no|strong="H6213"\w* knowledge, \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* eat \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \add as\add* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* eat bread, \w And|strong="H6213"\w* call \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* God?

\w There|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* great fear, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fear \w was|strong="H3808"\w*; \w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H3045"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* encampeth against thee: \w Thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w hast|strong="H3045"\w* put \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shame, because \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H3045"\w* rejected \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

Oh \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H6106"\w* Israel \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H6106"\w* Zion! \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* bringeth back \w the|strong="H3588"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w* rejoice, \add and\add* Israel \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* glad.
